org.wattdepot.common.domainmodel

Class DescriptiveStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wattdepot.common.domainmodel.DescriptiveStats

  • public class DescriptiveStats
extends Object
    DescriptiveStats - A simple calculated historical min, average, and max for a depository, sensor, timestamp and number of samples.
    Author:
    Cam Moore
